text: 13:9 Ua Me Ini 20:13-17; Ofa Gami 19:18; Godɨn Araziba 5:17-21E fo, Moses Osirizir Araziba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gumazamizibav soghtɨ, me arɨmɨghiran markɨ. Ia okɨman markɨ. Ia gumazamizir igharazibar biziba bagh naviba dɨkavan markɨ. Ia poroghamiba uari bakɨm uari ko dakuan markɨ.” Moses Osirizir Arazir kaba ko maba sara uaghan iti, da bar moghɨra akar vamɨra an aven iti, akar kam kamakɨn: “Nɨ uabɨra uabɨ gifongezɨ moghɨn, gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongegh.”
